titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to correct the tariff treatment of certain nickel catalysts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 9/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on certain nickel compounds containing nickel powder, or nickel compound powder, suspended or encapsulated in vegetable oil or tallow.
